# ADR Plugin — Claude Code Plugin

> Complete lifecycle management for Architectural Decision Records

ADR Plugin is a Claude Code plugin that provides full lifecycle management for
Architectural Decision Records (ADRs). It includes commands for creating, listing,
updating, superseding, searching, and exporting ADRs. Three specialized agents
(Author, Compliance, Researcher) assist with ADR workflows. Twelve skills cover
ADR fundamentals, formats (MADR, Nygard, Y-Statement, Alexandrian, Business Case,
Tyree-Akerman), quality review, compliance auditing, decision drivers, and
CI/CD integration.

## Documentation
- Site: https://zircote.com/adr
- GitHub: https://github.com/zircote/adr

## Commands
- /adr:setup — Interactive ADR configuration setup
- /adr:new — Create a new ADR
- /adr:list — List all ADRs with optional status filtering
- /adr:update — Update an existing ADR
- /adr:supersede — Create a new ADR that supersedes an existing one
- /adr:search — Search ADRs by content, status, tags, or date
- /adr:export — Export ADRs to HTML, JSON, or PDF format

## Agents
- ADR Author — Detects architectural discussions and suggests capturing decisions as ADRs
- ADR Compliance — Audits code changes against accepted ADRs
- ADR Researcher — Researches context, options, and best practices for architectural decisions

## Installation
claude install gh:zircote/adr
